data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Trivinho-Strixino, Susana, Shimabukuro, Erika Mayumi (2018): Brazilian Pseudochironomini (Diptera: Chironomidae) Part 2. New Pseudochironomus and Riethia species. Zootaxa 4403 (2): 245-260, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4403.2.2|7 occurrences
